answers.answer: I should also add that I wake up frequently through the night with feeling hot.   I am 2 months late for my cycle and think I may be starting menapause as I am 48.    I also may have ovarian cysts again.    So....could all this be hormonal???

question: My numerous symptoms:  Heart Flutters, Light headed and tingly feeling in face and lips especially with quick movements, horrible pain in left leg (recently diagnosed with venous insufficiency), anxiety feeling like I'm gonna have a nervous breakdown.    I'm on 450 mg. wellbutrin for depression, nexium 40 mg for hiatil hernia, metformin (for boarder line diabetes in which I am only having higher blood sugars in morning around 140-160 even if they were normal before bedtime), Triam/Hctz 37 mg (waterpill).   I working in a very busy clinical lab that is constantly busy and no time to even go to the bathroom some days.   I also am 100 lbs overweight and have sleep apnea.    I feel defeated in losing this weight because every time a try something happens.    I was walking 30 minutes a day and know my leg hurts so bad I have to keep it elevated.    The doctor put me on meformin to help but I just gained a few more pounds!     I have had these feelings in my head off and on for the past 14 years.   I have always related them to the doctors messing around with the depression meds.   Recently doc changed my dose of wellbutrin and it happened.   He said  those feelings are  a medical issue and not related to going off the meds.   I didn't agree and put myself back on it and felt better for awhile.   But have stopped taking lexapro (10 mg.) about a month ago and these systems are back.    So not sure if it is medical (related to heart flutter and venous insufficiency) or is it a Serotonin problem.    This head problem first manifested itself 14 years ago when I was pregnant and just quit smoking.  And got worse after I delivered.   So is it hormonal??    Did 15 years of smoking effect my Serotonin levels??   I was healthier and thinner as a smoker!!   I just want to feel good again so I can exercise and enjoy life!   Please help.
title: Dizzy and Heart flutters....
